text:
@MariaBartiromo @SundayFutures @FoxNews @MorningsMaria @FoxBusiness While we watch our nation taken over by #marxist #revolutionaries- Seems #COVID19 turned out to be far too (suspiciously) handy to Left political officials & figures, as well as China.
How much money did the US government give the #Wuhanflu lab during the #Obama administration?
